result.eng: Can I can drop in to you in the afternoon?
result.ga: An féidir liom bualadh isteach chugat tráthnóna
result.orig: An féidir liom bualadh isteach chugat tráthnóna
result.html: An féidir liom bualadh isteach chugat tráthnónaCan I can drop in to you in the afternoon?
result.ponchtml: An féidir liom bualaḋ isteaċ ċugat tráṫnónaCan I can drop in to you in the afternoon?

result.eng: Would you like to meet tomorrow?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat bualadh le chéile amárach
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat bualadh le chéile amárach
result.html: Ar mhaith leat bualadh le chéile amárachWould you like to meet tomorrow?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat bualaḋ le ċéile amáraċWould you like to meet tomorrow?

result.eng: It was very strange meeting my father for the first time.
result.ga: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uair
result.orig: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uair
result.html: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uairIt was very strange meeting my father for the first time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé an-aisteaċ bualaḋ le m'aṫair don ċéad uairIt was very strange meeting my father for the first time.

result.eng: You'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ga: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.orig: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.html: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oícheYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ponchtml: Ċeapfá óna gcuid cainte go raiḃ siad ag bualaḋ craicinn gaċ oíċeYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.

result.eng: What time will we be meeting?
result.ga: Cén t-am a bheidh muid ag bualadh le chéile
result.orig: Cén t-am a bheidh muid ag bualadh le chéile
result.html: Cén t-am a bheidh muid ag bualadh le chéileWhat time will we be meeting?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a ḃeiḋ muid ag bualaḋ le ċéileWhat time will we be meeting?

result.html: Deas bualadh leatNice to meet you.
result.ponchtml: Deas bualaḋ leatNice to meet you.

result.ga: Is breá liom bualadh le daoine
result.orig: Is breá liom bualadh le daoine
result.html: Is breá liom bualadh le daoineI like meeting people.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom bualaḋ le daoineI like meeting people.

result.eng: I am pleased to meet you.
result.html: Tá áthas orm bualadh leatI am pleased to meet you.
result.ponchtml: Tá áṫas orm bualaḋ leatI am pleased to meet you.

result.ga: Beidh mé ag bualadh le roinnt cairde
result.orig: Beidh mé ag bualadh le roinnt cairde
result.html: Beidh mé ag bualadh le roinnt cairdeI'll be meeting some friends.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé ag bualaḋ le roinnt cairdeI'll be meeting some friends.

result.eng: It's nice to meet you, Eoin.
result.ga: Tá sé go deas bualadh leat a Eoin
result.orig: Tá sé go deas bualadh leat a Eoin
result.html: Tá sé go deas bualadh leat a EoinIt's nice to meet you, Eoin.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé go deas bualaḋ leat a EoinIt's nice to meet you, Eoin.

result.eng: It's nice to meet you as well.

result.html: Tá sé go deas bualadh leatsa freisinIt's nice to meet you as well.

result.eng: The crowd started yelling and clapping.
result.ga: Thosaigh an slua ag liú agus ag bualadh bos
result.orig: Thosaigh an slua ag liú agus ag bualadh bos
result.html: Thosaigh an slua ag liú agus ag bualadh bosThe crowd started yelling and clapping.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ an slua ag liú agus ag bualaḋ bosThe crowd started yelling and clapping.

result.eng: They would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ga: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.orig: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.html: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ponchtml: Ba ġnáċ leo bualaḋ le ċéile i mbialanna agus málaí a ṁalartú a raiḃ an ċuma ċéanna orṫuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
